Detailed Description

An external timeline.

This class is represent a reactor external timeline declaration It refers to the corresponding relation and also offer some management on the goals that have been posted to this timeline and when they should be dispatched to the ownere of this timeline

TeleoReactor

See also:
class Relation
Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>

Definition at line 137 of file external.hh.

void TREX::transaction::details::external::dispatch ( TICK  current,
goal_queue &  sent 
)

Goal dispatching management.

Parameters:
[in] current The current tick
[out] sent List of goals being dispatched
Precondition:
This instance is valid

This method is called when a the tick value has just been updated to current. It will update the pending goals queue of this timeline and duipatch to the owner of this timeline all the goals that can be dispatched at current. Conversely it will remove the goals on the pending queue that necessarily startes before current and indicate such operation in TREX.log

All the goals dispatched during this call will be added to sent and removed from the pending queue

See also:
valid() const

Referenced by TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::newTick(), and TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::workRatio().

bool details::external::post_goal ( goal_id const &  g  ) 

Goal posting.

Parameters:
[in] g A goal
Precondition:
This instance is valid
the object of g is the same as the timeline referred by this instance

Add the goal to this instance pending goal queue. This goal will then be processed during subsequent calls of the dispatch method

Return values:
true g has been added to the goal queue
false g was already present in the goal queue
Warning:
the preconditions described above are not checked here (as they should be checked by TeleoReactor class). Caling this method without controlling these will result on an unknown behavior of the system
See also:
valid() const
operator->() const

dispatch(TICK, goal_queue &)
recall(goal_id const &)

void details::external::recall ( goal_id const &  g  ) 

Recall a goal.

Parameters:
[in] g A goal
Precondition:
This instance is valid

recall the goal g. If this goal is not in the pending queue a recall notification will be sent to the oewner of this timeline
